subject: Baseball
lead_paragraph: In his first game in Toronto since leaving, Halladay pitched an eight-hitter to win his sixth straight game and the Philadelphia Phillies topped the Blue Jays 5-3 on Saturday.
snippet: In his first game in Toronto since leaving, Halladay pitched an eight-hitter to win his sixth straight game and the Philadelphia Phillies topped the Blue Jays 5-3 on Saturday.
